Some artworks I designed for conferences and events I organized or

## Conference posters

There are some posters I designed for event or conferences I organized
or co-organized. They are in [pages (OSX)](https://www.apple.com/pages/)
format. Feel free to re-use them for designing your own (if you like them)..
Some sources are available on the
[GitHub repositorty](https://github.com/rougier/conference-posters).

All posters are licensed under a [CC-BY International
4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) license.

## Scientific posters

There are some posters I designed for event or conferences I participated
in. They are either in [pages (OSX)](https://www.apple.com/pages/) or
[ComicLife (OSX)](https://plasq.com/apps/comiclife/macwin/) formats.
Feel free to re-use for designing your own. Some sources are available on the
[GitHub repositorty](https://github.com/rougier/scientific-posters).

All posters are licensed under a [CC-BY International 4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) license.
